channel.title: Client stuck on, Checking for updates - 1%, 667 servers!
channel.description:
Hello,
On every 667 I try to play the client stops with loading at 1%- checking for updates. Also all the 317's can't I play, I can't login on them.
I tried to download other java versions and it didn't work. I also tried to delete all caches and it didn't help too.
I don't know what to do more to make it work, the servers worked last month and I don't know what I did b4 the clients stopped with loading.
Please someone help me. :confused: :confused:

@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“mrdanz15, post:8, topic:451561”]Can’t you people read? that is not my problem…
but i fixed the problem, my Firewall was set toohigh.

  • Close topic.[/quote]
    Notice that everyone who posted here had no idea what they were talking about, i would have said ‘check your firewall’.

item.title: Client stuck on, Checking for updates - 1%, 667 servers!
item.dc:creator: @dutchevolution dutchevolution
item.description:
@dutchevolution wrote:

in your run.bat or java file to run your server/client it should say some thing like java© cd/class?
after that put in your jdk destination, i have been having this problem aswel but now its solved!

should look something like this-
@echo off
title …!
CD:/class … this is where you put your jdk destination
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
start Run-Server.bat
exit
GL with future coding!

Read full topic
item.source: Client stuck on, Checking for updates - 1%, 667 servers!

item.title: Client stuck on, Checking for updates - 1%, 667 servers!
item.dc:creator: @mrdanz15 mrdanz15
item.description:
@mrdanz15 wrote:

I can’t Play OTHER servers and ALL are not working. I know how to code and thats not the problem.

I tried the top 100 of this toplist and other toplists and ALL are not working

on 317’s i cant login, client gets stuck.
on higher versions it gets stuck on Checking for updates - 1%.
and on 718 loading 728 servers it get stuck at Checking for updates - 0%

—EDIT----
I got the newest Jre and jdk versions so don’t tell me to download new ones. i also tried to download old ones and it didn’t work too.
i also reseted my router and putted my firewall off.

—EDIT2—

Minecraft and maplestory servers aren’t working too.

Read full topic
